topic.title: Response
topic.shortdesc: These are possible responses for the xmen GET request.

p.codeblock: # RESPONSE 200 OK [ { "id": 1, "name": "Hisako Ichiki", "heroName": "Dust", "power": "Sand manipulation", "debut": "New X-Men #133 (2002)", "creator": "Grant Morrison, Ethan Van Sciver" }, { "id": 2, "name": "Anna Marie", "heroName": "Rogue", "power": "Power absorption through touch", "debut": "Avengers Annual #10 (1981)", "creator": "Chris Claremont, Michael Golden" }, { "id": 3, "name": "Jean Grey", "heroName": "Phoenix", "power": "Telepathy, telekinesis, Phoenix Force", "debut": "X-Men #1 (1963)", "creator": "Stan Lee, Jack Kirby" } ]
